markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Cat Pounce](/Actions.aspx?ID=17) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 215 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The cat Strides and then Strikes. If it was [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) at the start of its Cat Pounce, it remains undetected until after the attack.
name: Cat Pounce
